description: A small bar in the East Blue where Zoro first encountered Billy the bandit and met Johnny and Yosaku.

keyEvents.title: Billy's Appearance at the Bar
keyEvents.description: Billy sits drinking at the bar when Yosaku spots him.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the episode's flashback story begins.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Defeats Billy
keyEvents.description: Zoro defeats Billy inside the bar to claim his bounty.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's efficiency as a bounty hunter.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Meets Johnny and Yosaku
keyEvents.description: Zoro meets Johnny and Yosaku at the bar and gives them Billy's bounty.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Zoro's friendship with Johnny and Yosaku begins.

description: A village storage facility in the East Blue that was attacked by Dick and his bandit crew seeking revenge for Billy's capture.

keyEvents.title: Dick Attacks the Village
keyEvents.description: Dick and his bandit crew attack the village storage facility.
keyEvents.significance: The main conflict location of the episode.

keyEvents.title: Harry Defends the Storage
keyEvents.description: Harry bravely attempts to defend the village storage from Dick's bandits.
keyEvents.significance: Showcases Harry's courage and inspires others.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Defeats Dick's Crew
keyEvents.description: Zoro uses Oni Giri to defeat Dick and his entire crew at the storage facility.
keyEvents.significance: The climactic battle of the episode takes place here.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' ship, shown in the present-day scenes of the episode.

keyEvents.title: Present Day Scene
keyEvents.description: The episode returns to the present day aboard the Going Merry with the Straw Hat crew.
keyEvents.significance: Provides closure to the flashback and shows Zoro's journey from lone wanderer to crew member.
